name: Ghost Hotel (itch) (60160317)
description:
Ghost Hotel

This game is part of the  Game Development 88738559 course

Ghost Hotel is mix Survival Action and Horror game . 

  1. Kill all of your enemy
  2. find the escape way

How To Play?

W/A/S/D - Walk

Space bar - Jump

Left click - Shoot

Start your game

Find  bullets

Shoot Your Enemy

Scarper

Find Escape Way
